stimulusHtml: Which of the following scenarios best describes schema assimilation?
choicesHtml: A child assumes she will not like broccoli because its shape is similar to that of cauliflower, which she does not like.
A woman sees a building on fire but does not call the fire department because she believes someone else will.
A salesperson persuades a buyer to purchase a small set of knives, hoping the buyer will upgrade to a larger set.
A father is able to remember only the last two items on a grocery list because they were added most recently.
